001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.authentication;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.authentication.PumpChallengeResponse;
010
011import java.util.Arrays;
012
013
014/**
015 * The second authorization message sent to the pump which contains the HMACed pairing code.
016 *
017 * When the Android libary is used, this message is invoked automatically by PumpX2 on Bluetooth
018 * connection initialization as part of performing the initial pump pairing process.
019 */
020/**
021 * The second authorization message sent to the pump which contains the HMACed pairing code.
022 *
023 * When the Android libary is used, this message is invoked automatically by PumpX2 on Bluetooth
024 * connection initialization as part of performing the initial pump pairing process.
025 *
026
027 *
028 * <br>
029 *
030 * Request message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.authentication.PumpChallengeResponse}, opCode 18, size 22
031 *
032 * <br>
033 *
034 * 
035 * <table border='1'>
036 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
037 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>18</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
038 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>22</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
039 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#REQUEST}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
040 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>characteristic</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic#AUTHORIZATION}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
041 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>response</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.authentication.PumpChallengeResponse}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
042 * </table>
043 */@MessageProps(
044    opCode=18,
045    size=22,
046    type=MessageType.REQUEST,
047    characteristic=Characteristic.AUTHORIZATION,
048    response=PumpChallengeResponse.class
049)
050public class PumpChallengeRequest extends Message {
051    private int appInstanceId;
052    private byte[] pumpChallengeHash;
053
054    public PumpChallengeRequest() {}
055
056    public PumpChallengeRequest(int appInstanceId, byte[] pumpChallengeHash) {
057        parse(buildCargo(appInstanceId, pumpChallengeHash));
058        Validate.isTrue(this.appInstanceId == appInstanceId);
059        Validate.isTrue(Arrays.equals(this.pumpChallengeHash, pumpChallengeHash));
060    }
061
062    public int getAppInstanceId() {
063        return appInstanceId;
064    }
065
066    public byte[] getPumpChallengeHash() {
067        return pumpChallengeHash;
068    }
069
070    private static byte[] buildCargo(int appInstanceId, byte[] pumpChallengeHash) {
071        byte[] cargo = new byte[22];
072        System.arraycopy(Bytes.combine(Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(appInstanceId), pumpChallengeHash), 0, cargo, 0, 22);
073
074        return cargo;
075    }
076
077    /**
078     * <table border="1">
079     * <caption>Parsed fields for PumpChallengeRequest:</caption>
080     * <tr><td><code>appInstanceId</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(Arrays.copyOfRange(raw, 0, 2), 0)</code></td></tr>
081     * <tr><td><code>pumpChallengeHash</code></td><td><code>Arrays.copyOfRange(raw, 2, raw.length)</code></td></tr>
082     * </table>
083     */
084    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
085        this.cargo = raw;
086        this.appInstanceId = Bytes.readShort(Arrays.copyOfRange(raw, 0, 2), 0);
087        this.pumpChallengeHash = Arrays.copyOfRange(raw, 2, raw.length);
088    }
089}
